attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister and his cabinet are in power to serve this country and the CROWN, not the european union, africa or america. We should be the main prioity, not bungled down the list like we're a disgrace. We pay our taxes, they just spend it on other countries. Time for things to change Gordon, or perhaps the next war won't be abroad.

rejection.details: Similar petitions already exist, for example: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/britishbritain/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
